backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for key frontend files describing styles, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining design tokens and dark mode variables for theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Assembles all landing page sections including navbar, hero, content sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/landing/CampusBu: Auto-scrolling buzz feed with fade‑in animation and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/landing/FinalCTA: Final download call‑to‑action section with fade‑in and dynamic link behavior.
frontend/src/components/landing/FixedWat: Fixed low‑opacity background logo for depth effect.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with logo, contact, legal links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/landing/ForEvery: Three‑card section describing features for students, runners, and vendors with fade‑in.
frontend/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx: Hero section with autoplay video background, headline text, and buttons for app download and runner sign-up.
frontend/src/components/landing/HowItWor: Displays a three-step explanation of how the app works with animated cards triggered on scroll.
frontend/src/components/landing/InlineDo: Simple centered call-to-action section containing a single download button that fades in on scroll.
frontend/src/components/landing/Navbar.t: Responsive navbar with scroll-based styling, navigation links, mobile menu, and download button.
frontend/src/components/landing/PhoneMoc: Renders a phone mockup frame with a screenshot and optional floating animation.
frontend/src/components/landing/RealAppE: Feature showcase section presenting multiple app screens with descriptions and scroll-triggered fade-in.
frontend/src/components/landing/ScrollPr: Top progress bar showing page scroll percentage using scroll position.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity auth, managing login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewFadeIn.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element enters view and trigger fade-in animations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that tracks the user's reduced motion preference via media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollY.ts: Hook returning the window scroll Y position with an event listener.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global CSS variables for a neon-green dark theme, and custom glow/animation utility classes with responsive and reduced‑motion variants.
frontend/src/landing/config.ts: Exports landing page config including download link, contact email, policy URLs, and social media profiles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, theme extensions for OKLCH color variables, custom animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architecture notes, and image specs for building the SideQuest neon‑cyberpunk landing page.
